name: Succubus Lillim&Millim
text: *Succubus Lillim* + *Succubus Millim*/nYou can also Special Summon this card (from your Extra Deck) by banishing the above monsters you control face-up. (This is treated as a Fusion Summon.)/nOnce per turn: You can target 1 monster your opponent controls; take control of it until the End Phase. If you control no other monsters, you can activate this effect during either player's turn./nIf this card is sent to the Graveyard: You can Special Summon either *Succubus Lillim* or *Succubus Millim* from your Graveyard or your banished zone.
